description: A compilation of the 100 greatest knockouts from the past two decades of the UFC. With host Jon Anik, we take a look at the most incredible knockouts ever seen, many of which have not been televised in years.
name: UFC: The Ultimate 100 Knockouts

original_info.id: UFC: Ultimate Fighting Championship: Ultimate Knockouts 1 & 2_2003
original_info.name: UFC: Ultimate Fighting Championship: Ultimate Knockouts 1 & 2
